summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Golden Gate Bakery website redesign. All core functionality working perfectly including backend APIs, frontend UI components, animations, and integrations.

design_issues.issue: Hero background image detection in automated tests shows as not loaded correctly, but visual inspection confirms it's working

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200 OK)
Contact message creation and retrieval
Status check endpoints
API validation (422 for invalid email)
Hero section loads with correct title and background
Floating navigation with glassmorphism effect
About section with parallax animations
Menu section with 6 products in bento grid layout
Product card hover effects (scale and image zoom)
Testimonials section with 4 customer reviews and 5-star ratings
Visit section with correct address, phone, and business hours
Google Maps embed integration
Contact form submission with success message
Contact form validation (email format, required fields)
Footer with bakery info and quick links
Smooth scroll behavior using Lenis
Framer Motion animations on scroll
Typography using Playfair Display and Manrope fonts
Color scheme following design guidelines
Responsive design on tablet and mobile viewports
All product images loading from Unsplash URLs
